1530320.name: Lawless Lands Supporter Outlander Skin Pack
1530320.description:
Lawless Lands

Due to community and player request, here is an outlander roleplaying skin pack!

This will add a "Wardrobe" item to your inventory which will allow you to freely change between the listed skins. Regular skins may still be accessed in game by paying 5 gold lords at the outfitter shops in Durgim's Mill or Pyrshen East Outskirts.

Outlander Skin Pack DLC:
  • 2 Stothlheim/Langmord Skins (M - Destroyer / F - Herbalist)
  • 2 Guilanal Skins (M - Searing Sands / F - Linen Gown)
  • 2 Sagerov Skins (M - Ranger / F - Survivalist)
  • 2 Crossia Skins (M - Criminal / F - Damsel)
  • 1 Honor Guard Skin
  • 1 Southern Mercenary Skin
  • 5 Gold Lords added to your Strongbox for a free default skin change at an outfitter's shop

*This DLC is intended for players who enjoy the game and want to continue to show their support for the developer and get some cool extras in the game.

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK, YOU MUST TALK TO HUSTAN IN THE PYRSHEN HOSPITAL! YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH! YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
